name: Sportful Kelly Short Sleeve Jersey - Women's
description: Modern styling meets road performance. This breathable jersey offers no distractions from your ride. It features 3 rear drop-in pockets and raw-cut sleeves that make layering arm warmers easy. It's sleek simplicity at its finest.Construction combines soft light materials for optimal breathability and great comfort.Silicone gripped hem with a drop tail provides good coverage.Raw-cut sleeves with flat elastic make layering arm warmers easy.Full length YKK® Vislon zipper lets you vent.3 back drop-in pockets.Reflective details.
